resources.string: If you first installed this game before March 7th, 2014, it is highly recommended that you reset your settings even if you\'ve never changed them. You can do so by going to Settings -> Scroll Down -> Reset All Settings. This message will disappear the next time you start this app.
Current piece is held when the hold box is tapped.
The t-spin recognition system used for scoring.
The base drop speed of the blocks. \nUnits: Lines/33 Milliseconds \nFrom 0.0 to 20.0 (Default: 0.033)
The number of lines needed to clear to advance a level. \nUnits: Lines \nFrom 1 to 2147483647 (Default: 10)
The level that you spawn in for marathon mode. \nFrom 1 to 2147483647 (Default: 1)
The ratio at which the drop speed increases by per level. \nFrom 0.0 to 20.0 (Default: 1.38)
The speed added to the base drop speed per level. \nUnits: Lines/33 Milliseconds \nFrom 0.0 to 20.0 (Default: 0.025)
Delay decreases once max dropspeed is reached.

The frame rate of the game. 
Note: A faster frame rate increases the base drop speed of the blocks. 
Units: Frames/Second 
From 1 to 60 (Default: 30)
The sensitivity threshold of the flick gestures. \nUnits: Velocity of Swipe (Pixels/Detection Cycle) \nFrom 1 to 2147483647 (Default: 30)
The delay before a block locks in place. \nUnits: Milliseconds \nFrom 0 to 2147483647 (Default: 1000)
The base drop speed of the block while soft dropping. \nUnits: Lines/Frame \nFrom 0.0 to 20.0 (Default: 0.45)
The length needed to drag before the "drag gesture" is recognized. \nUnits: Pixels \nFrom 0 to 2147483647 (Default: 60)
The starting time of Time Attack. \nUnits: Seconds \nFrom 0 to 2147483647 (Default: 120)
App will be restart when you return to the previous screen.
Highly recommended. Works best on AMOLED screens.

Controls: 
	 Move Left/Right: Drag Left/Right 
	 Hard Drop: Swipe Down 
	 Soft Drop: Drag Down 
	 Hold Block: Swipe Up

Scoring: 
	 Base Points: 
		 Single: 100 
		 Double: 300 
		 Triple: 500 
		 Tetris: 800 
	 Base Twist (T-spin) Points: 
		 No-Clear, Kicked: 100 
		 No-Clear, Not Kicked: 400 
		 Single, Kicked: 200 
		 Single, Not Kicked: 800 
		 Double: 1200 
		 Triple: 1600 
	 Back to Back Tetris/Twist Clear: Base Points * 1.5 
	 Chaining: 50 * Chain # 
	 
	 No-Clear Twists only give points in 3-corner T mode. 
	 Only T-Tetriminos can twist in 3-corner T mode.

Version: 1.0.4 
Produced by Jerry Jiang (tpcstld) 
Logo by Margaret Lu 
 
Jetris is an open source project. If you wish to contribute to Jetris, please go to 
www.github.com/tpcstld/Jetris
